tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE solar_power_technologies (
    cell_technology_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cell_technology_name TEXT,
    efficiency FLOAT,
    manufacturer TEXT,
    production_capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE solar_panel_performance (
    panel_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    technology_id INT NOT NULL,
    panel_area DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL,
    power_output DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (technology_id) REFERENCES solar_technologies(technology_id)
);

CREATE TABLE solar_panels (
    panel_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    panel_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    technology_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    efficiency FLOAT NOT NULL,
    width FLOAT NOT NULL,
    height FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE installations (
    installation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    capacity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    panel_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (panel_id) REFERENCES solar_panels(panel_id)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    energy_output FLOAT NOT NULL,
    efficiency FLOAT NOT NULL,
    panel_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (panel_id) REFERENCES solar_panels(panel_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    description TEXT NOT NULL,
    installation_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (installation_id) REFERENCES installations(installation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyProduction (
  production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cell_id INT,
  energy_produced FLOAT NOT NULL,
  date_produced DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (cell_id) REFERENCES SolarCells(cell_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cell_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (cell_id) REFERENCES SolarCells(cell_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cell_id INT,
  performance_rating VARCHAR(50),
  performance_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (cell_id) REFERENCES SolarCells(cell_id)
);

CREATE TABLE InverterDetails (
  inverter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cell_id INT,
  inverter_model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  inverter_capacity FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (cell_id) REFERENCES SolarCells(cell_id)
);
